headline: How Analyst Upgrades and Data Center Growth Are Shaping Pentair's Investment Narrative
summary: Pentair's fair value price target has recently inched up, rising from $120.28 to $121.53. This adjustment reflects subtle shifts in analyst sentiment and is largely attributed to improved revenue growth expectations and positive operating updates. Stay tuned to learn how ongoing updates to the Pentair narrative could help you keep pace with the stock's evolving outlook. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story. Head over to our Company Report to find new ways to value...
